name: Scorpion Run
description:
Scorpion Run is a endless runner developed by Dixon A. Rivera Ruiz in  MonoGame. It was started as a simple student project then was further developed to a arcade like game. Synopsis : Run without stopping as Scorpid and travel through different lands avoiding obstacles and enemies that are in your way preventing you from reaching the goal. Requirements:
  • Size: 54.8 MB
  • DirectX 11
